title: Christian Slater - The Good Shepherd (2004) The truth will test his faith to the limit.

sources.title: Christian Slater - The Good Shepherd (2004) The truth will test his faith to the limit.
sources.description:
Father Daniel Clemens (Christian Slater) uncovers a dangerous secret after a fellow priest is accused of a serious crime â€” now he's racing to expose a hidden conspiracy before it destroys him.  Teaming up with reporter Madeline Finney (Molly Parker), he dodges powerful enemies while unraveling a twisty mystery buried in the Church's deepest vaults.

Original title: The Good Shepherd (2004)
Alternative title: The Confessor

KEY CREDITS
Directed by: Lewin Webb
Screenplay by: Brad Mirman (The Vatican Tapes)
Based on the novel by: Daniel Easterman
Genres: Drama, Mystery, Thriller, Religon

STARRING
Christian Slater - Daniel Clemens
Molly Parker - Madeline Finney
Stephen Rea - McCaran
Gordon Pinsent - Cardinal Ledesna
Nancy Beatty - Lucy Gallagher
Von Flores - Father Andrews
Daniel Kash - Jeffrey Altman
Alex Paxton-Beesley - Monica
